title: Russia Orders Withdrawal From Kherson City, in Potential Blow to War Effort
description: A retreat from the strategic city would be a major victory for Kyiv’s forces. But Ukraine’s military was not convinced the Russians intended to fully withdraw.
dc:creator: The New York Times
media:credit: Finbarr O'Reilly for The New York Times
media:description: Workers at a metallurgical plant preparing food packages to be donated in Zaporizhzhia, Ukraine, on Tuesday.
